content: भ्रांतिमत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Revolving, turning round; भ्रांतिमद्व रियंत्रं <ls>M. 2. 18.</ls> {@--2@} Erring, mistaking, being under a delusion. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} A figure of speech in which one thing is represented as being mistaken for another on account of the close resemblance between the two; भ्रांतिमानन्यसंवित्तत्तुल्यदर्शने <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} कपाले मार्जारः पय इति करान् लेढि शशिनः &c.; see <ls>V. 3. 2</ls>; <ls>Māl. 1. 2</ls> also.
